name: Portal Run (Gwilym and Michael)
description:
Portal Run is a 2D puzzle game inspired by Valve's Portal (2007) with a big twist - you can only move by placing portals. Think your way out of sticky situations by remembering how both speed and direction (relative to the portals), are conserved when being teleported. Once you understand the basics, levels that look impossible at first can be solved with a bit of brainpower. Enjoy!

By Gwilym Hughes and Michael Baxendale

How to Play

Use your cursor to aim, then click to fire a portal from your player's head. You can't fire a portal to somewhere through a wall or outside of the screen space.
